title: Love Island's Danny and Jourdan 'split as she accuses him of talking to other girls'
text:

Love Island's Jourdan Riane has reportedly dumped boyfriend Danny Williams.

It's said she's accused him of chatting to other girls while he was out parying.

Jourdan is reported to have confronted Danny after receiving messages from girls claiming he had been "flirting" with them, before dumping him.

A source told The Sun : "Jourdan and Danny have had a few ups and downs since leaving the show but they had been getting on great recently and Jourdan was so happy.

"Things changed in the last few weeks though and Danny started acting distant and started going on more nights out.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"Jourdan started to hear rumours he was speaking to other girls behind her back. She confronted him about it but he just laughed it off."

They added that Jourdan received messages from girls Danny had been "flirting" with and that she told him it was over.

Sources also tell the publication that Danny "hardly protested" when Jourdan said it was over.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Models Danny, 21, and Jourdan, 24, only lasted a few days in the Love Island villa, but it had been going from strength to strength since then, and they even recently moved in together.

Just a week after being dumped from the show, they revealed they'd met each other's families and confirmed they were officially boyfriend and girlfriend.

In September, they moved in together and were even talking about marriage.

Jourdan freely expressed she felt "proud, scared, nervous and excited" to be taking her relationship with Danny to the next step.

(Image: Jonathan Hordle/REX)

Of their big move, she wrote: "Always wanted to move since before the show....and made it my mission since coming out to make sure I did. Finally have a house to make into a home.

"Feel proud, scared, nervous, excited all in one. Here’s to new chapters."

Danny was feeling equally as elated as he took to Instagram to mark their relationship milestone with snaps of their new home.

He wrote: "Feeling grateful to be able to make this possible. Hard work pays off. Excited for the next chapter."

Mirror Online has contacted Danny and Jourdan's representatives for comment.
description: The couple, who met on this year's Love Island, are said to have parted ways after she called time on the romance
